name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Firmograph: Instant Company and Persona Research

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Firmograph extension accelerates and simplifies sales research with instant, accurate, and fresh data for all your accounts & leads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save hours researching companies and people with Chrome’s essential Sales Research Copilot. Know your clients better than they know themselves with real-time updates and actionable insights tailored to your target companies and personas.

💼 Be Ready for Every Meeting
Gain instant credibility by knowing your client’s challenges, strategic priorities, competitive positioning, personal goals, and more.

🎯 Never Miss a Sales Opportunity
Stay ahead with real-time alerts when buying signals change. Build a custom news feed focused on the companies and signals you care about the most.

💡 Craft Compelling Outreach
Personalize your messaging with pinpoint accuracy using data tailored to your target companies and personas.

🏆 Trusted by Top B2B Sellers
From innovative startups like AgentSync and Fitch to global giants like Google and Amazon, Firmograph is the go-to tool for sales professionals who demand the best.

📣 What Users Are Saying:

“Holy sh*t, this is super super interesting.”
- Peter, VP Customer Experience

“Firmograph cuts my research time by 30+ minutes per customer.”
- Derek Dowd, Account Executive at UserTesting

“Firmograph frees up 2+ hours each week previously spent prospecting”
- Sean O’Donnell, Account Executive

“If it’s meaningful and related to ACV, Firmograph is best“
- Andrew, Account Executive

🎁 Firmograph’s Free Version Includes
- Full company and persona reports, including:
   • Key Challenges
   • Funding
   • Technographic Data
   • Competitive Positioning
   • Company Overview
   • Executive Team
   • Hiring Trends
- Follow up to 5 companies
- Customize 1 signal for your target companies, for example:
   • Breaches (if you sell cybersecurity)
   • Missed revenue targets (if you sell sales optimization)
   • Government fines (if you sell compliance services)

⚡ Get Started in Seconds
1. Install the Firmograph Chrome Extension.
2. Pin it for quick access.
3. Browse any website or LinkedIn page.
4. Instantly view detailed company and persona reports in your browser.

Ready to join thousands of top performers who are closing more deals with less effort? Install Firmograph today and elevate your sales game!
